title: THOUGHTS ON TAHM KENCH? NEW CHAMP
body: What are your thoughts on the new champion revealed "Tahm Kench - The River King"???

replies.body: another tank that has %health dmg and insane base dmg!! cool!!!!!!!!!!!! ur a bad player that cant position well or space?? never fear riot have made yet another champ to solve that problemo!!! w0000000000000t!!! ALSO ANOTHER GLOBAL ULT W00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000T!!!!!!!!!

> [{quoted}](name=Levin Is Garbage,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=suj1wv2h,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-06-24T04:17:34.305+0000)
>
> another tank that has %health dmg and insane base dmg!! cool!!!!!!!!!!!! ur a bad player that cant position well or space?? never fear riot have made yet another champ to solve that problemo!!! w0000000000000t!!! ALSO ANOTHER GLOBAL ULT W00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000T!!!!!!!!!

Not global, his abilites arent very dmging, trundle is gonna rape him if he goes to the solo lanes.Adcs counter him if he Hp tanks, etc

amazing my friend you have evaluated this large frog very well but i must tell you my friend your observation skills are quite spectacular but i am quite sorry my friend but your theories about how this large frog will be countered are very clearly made by a bronze player with the intelligence the wood i used to build my papas shack
I thought his Ult was like TF Ult range. Not global, just large.
Just watched some gameplay on PBE. Broken piece of crap he is LOL He tanks say, 3000 damage, then activates his E and tanks like 2000 damage again with the shield... WTF

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=suj1wv2h,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-06-24T05:34:01.949+0000)
>
> Just watched some gameplay on PBE. Broken piece of crap he is LOL He tanks say, 3000 damage, then activates his E and tanks like 2000 damage again with the shield... WTF

he doesnt tank the dmg. He takes the dmg as a shield then regens 20% (Or less) of the dmg, he still takes the dmg. if it was 300 dmg it would be by fountain laser not a kat or anything like her

what...

His E active means the he turns the damage he has taken into a Shield and can tank it again...

Oh yeah his an amazing design, because supports weren't cancerous enough, They didn't protect their adc's enough. I cant even kill a braindead carry anymore due to champs like morgana, thresh or Leona. Protection fucking overload. This guy takes the cake though, seriously what was riot thinking.

Also why the fuck does he deal so much damage, like his gonna be full tank, unkillable, protect the living shit out of his carry and on top deal huge damage.
Modified (and arguably buffed) Kalista ult, buffed Twisted Fate ult. He's going to be a pain of a tank.

Will be a Sion style laner. Will depend how much spitting an minion does as to whether he will be a good laner or not. Seems like an ok support, will probably end up being a tank jungler.

People saying he will be good in team fights since he can eat the adc or someone for 2 secs, but he has to get 3 stacks on them first, so we'll see if he even gets to eat an enemy at all during a teamfight.
Most likely, eat someone like Alistar or Morgana, Righteous Glory into the enemy and spit them out.

He can Reksai Ult half the map with a teammate too. The Splitpush strats are real.

His w actually adds stacks (long cooldown I would assume though)
Although you are right getting down and dirty with their adc is a bad idea because they will just peel him like a potato and serve him on a silver platter
I hope hes a tank, bring trundle back into the meta lel
